import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import reactDom from "react-dom" import Login from '../accounts/Login'; import Register from '../accounts/Register'; import './LoginModal.css' import { CgClose } from 'react-icons/all' export default function LoginModal({ open, action, onClose, onSubmit}) { console.log(action) const [modalType, setModalType] = useState(String(action)); console.log(modalType) if (!open) return null if (modalType === "login") { return reactDom.createPortal( <>

New to Reddit? setModalType("register")}>SIGN UP

, document.getElementById('portal') ) } else if (modalType === "register") { return reactDom.createPortal( <>
, document.getElementById('portal') ) } }
